sect1.title: About this library
sect1.para: This is a macro library written in the C programming language, and implements fixed point arithmetic. Although current state-of-the-art FPU's are getting faster and faster, it might still be beneficial to implement your algorithms with fixed point arithmetic to gain even higher speeds, although at the cost of precission. Fixed point arithmetic is less precise than floating point arithmetic, but lots of times, the extra precission is not needed.

I chose to implement this library as a set of macro's instead of functions, to avoid having the extra overhead of function calls. This might add a little to the codesize of the program that utilizes this library, but assures you that no precious clockcycles are wasted by saving and restoring CPU registers.

Possible fields of use are:
Games
Embedded systems
Audio and video filtering
Optimized codecs
